channel.title: Steel drags
channel.description: Well I'm a level 64 with 65 range pretty much 66 (1k exp away) and I want to kill steel drags for exp + cash and hopefully a visage?? :P Well if you can tell me what to food and items to use with range im 43 prayer and 45 defence thanks! Oh and if there is any safe spots there or pots and im cba to find out where they are so if you can post :P

item.title: Steel drags
item.dc:creator: @killakj killakj
item.description:
@killakj wrote:

[quote=“pk4pk, post:5, topic:192705”][quote author=Thabest link=topic=256500.msg2136554#msg2136554 date=1206525072]
level 64 isint enough for steal dragons you need to be at least 90
[/quote]
Why is this? Range can easily take out iron and green. Why not steels?[/quote]

that is true if you try to use normal combat against them at this lvl you would die easily…but range and mage dont involve close encounters

Read full topic

item.title: Steel drags
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“pk4pk, post:13, topic:192705”][quote author=Taharok link=topic=256500.msg2140108#msg2140108 date=1206678436]

My mage is only 55

You can do fire blast/bolt right? that will do more damage faster and easier than 65 range will.

The fire bolt I can do up to like earth bolt

I hope you haven’t been playing runescape for the seven hours in between your post and thug-life’s. Because if you have, you could have easily gotten up to fire bolt in that time period.
[/quote]
I only play runescape 1-2 hours a day usually I dont really mage so I dont no the levels and costs[/quote]

I just used a runehq calculator to determine how many high alchs it would take to go from 55 magic to 59 (the level for fire blast because you can already do fire bolt). It would take 1,250 alchs. Now, I will not go into detail about what you would need to buy, how much it would cost, the assumed time it would take to buy all those things, the amount of money you would gain or loose, and the length of time that would be spent alching. I would not do this because it is not worth my time. However, I’m sure such things could get done in an easy five minutes by someone who doesn’t give the excuse “i dont really mage so I dont no the levels and costs”. That is a lazy excuse and it infuriates me (mainly because it reminds me of moparscape). I hope you get my drift because I am done explaining this same, redundant explanation.

Read full topic

item.title: Steel drags
item.dc:creator: @pk4pk pk4pk
item.description:
@pk4pk wrote:

[quote=“ThugLife, post:7, topic:192705”]Its best to mage steal drags all you need is:
A few thousand fire blasts (Bolts work good too)
Best mage stuff you have
Anti dragon shield
About 5 - 10 sharks
Fire/lava staff
Oh and some nature runes to alch some of the lower priced stuff to save space so you don’t have to keep going to the bank
Rest antifire pots.[/quote]
My mage is only 55

Read full topic

item.title: Steel drags
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“pk4pk, post:5, topic:192705”][quote author=Thabest link=topic=256500.msg2136554#msg2136554 date=1206525072]
level 64 isint enough for steal dragons you need to be at least 90
[/quote]
Why is this? Range can easily take out iron and green. Why not steels?[/quote]

Because steels have like 1.5 times higher defense than irons. You can’t kill these in loads unless you are at least 85 ranged. I personally wouldn’t recommend it for anyone under 70.

Read full topic

item.title: Steel drags
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

umm you are going to range right? use crossbow with whatever bolts df shield range pot antifire pot and a few prayer pots for those close encounters and maybe 1 or 2 sharks.

Basically with df shield and anti pots combined you cant take fire damage from their fire balls… so just stay a few feat away.

Read full topic
